actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to the closing of Public Health Service hospitals and clinics.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress in opposition to the closing of Public Health Service hospitals and clinics, and in favor of making additional funds available for the modernizing, upgrading, and expanding of all such facilities.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to the closing of Public Health Service hospitals and clinics.
